Articles.Content: Welcome! This is a thread where I discuss the progress of two different quick saves a.k.a. "Universes" in a 0.90 career save. There are two to start off, but we can split one into two if you suggest it, and if I have the amount of funds, in game rep, and Science if I pool both Universe's supplies. Last but not least, you decide what mission I \*try\* to do in a cirtan universe, just say the mission, and say what Universe you want it in, and I think the price for a new Universe right now should be 300 science, 200,000 funds, and 150 rep. Cheers, RAINCRAFTER.

First missions! This is for both Universes. For the first, I am taking it slow and steady. First Rocket:

![eSPS5OB.png](http://i.imgur.com/eSPS5OB.png)

Next! For the second mission, we went to space on this rocket.

![hZuXNyj.png](http://i.imgur.com/hZuXNyj.png)

Okay, that's done. Here's what the tech tree looked like when I was "done with one."

![KzccXV4.png](http://i.imgur.com/KzccXV4.png)

Universe 2! Here's my first rocket (it also went into space) and the tech tree from number 2.

![5dq2IHu.png](http://i.imgur.com/5dq2IHu.png)

![CVRPXYY.png](http://i.imgur.com/CVRPXYY.png)
